testcase.name: Kullanici sayfaya giris yapar
testcase.system-out: Given user "https://www.amazon.com.tr" logs in..............................passed And confirms that it is on the amazon page and on the homepage..............passed And scroll to the bottom of the page and see the countries..................passed And Hakkımızda, Bizimle Para Kazanın, Amazon Ödeme Araçları, Size Yardımcı Olalım sections appear.passed And backToTop click.........................................................passed And clicks and verifies All.................................................passed And all click...............................................................passed
